tool_description: Tracks and manages all interactions related to specific customer reviews including responses, follow-ups, customer replies, and resolution status for comprehensive review lifecycle management.

review_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer review

interaction_type.description: Type of interaction: initial_response, follow_up, customer_reply, escalation, resolution

interaction_content.description: Content of the interaction being tracked

agent_id.description: ID of agent handling the interaction (human or automated)

interaction_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the interaction in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid review ID: Provide a valid review_id parameter.
Invalid interaction type: Use one of [initial_response, follow_up, customer_reply, escalation, resolution].
Invalid timestamp format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format for interaction_timestamp.
Review not found: The specified review_id does not exist in the system.
usage: Provide review_id and interaction_type to track review interactions. Include interaction_content for detailed logging and agent_id to track who handled the interaction. System will auto-generate timestamp if not provided.

interaction_id.description: Unique identifier for this interaction record

total_interactions.description: Total number of interactions for this review

current_status.description: Current status of the review: pending, responded, ongoing, resolved

last_customer_activity.description: Timestamp of last customer activity on this review

requires_followup.description: Whether the review requires additional follow-up actions

escalation_level.description: Current escalation level: none, tier1, tier2, management
